thread.title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment sees FY 2017 net profit could rise up to 10 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment sees FY 2017 net profit could rise up to 10 pct

organizations.name: hangzhou prevail optoelectronic equipment co ltd

text:
Jan 29(Reuters) - Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit could rise up to 10 percent, or to be 45 million yuan to 49.5 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 45 million yuan
* Says increased government subsidies is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/8KFyEi
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
